title: The Darling Buds of May
description: Introducing the Larkins, a family with aa deserved place in popular mythology.Here they come, in the first of their hilarious rural adventures, crashing their way through the English countryside in the wake of Pop, the quick-eyed golden-hearted junk-dealer,and ma,with a mouthful of crisps and a laugh like a jelly.
author: H.E. Bates
